activities.label: Initial Commit

activities.label: Code Cleanup
activities.description: Removed unnecessary files and ensured code followed the repository standards.

label: Day 2: Data Scraping and Code Cleanup

activities.label: Menu and Item Scraping
activities.description: Expanded the scraping script to include detailed menu and item data.

activities.label: Code Refactoring
activities.description: Identified and removed redundant code segments, improving overall efficiency.

activities.label: Error Fixes
activities.description: Addressed naming conventions and fixed bugs affecting data retrieval.

activities.label: File Reorganization
activities.description: Restructured files and directories for better clarity and maintenance.

activities.label: Database Validation
activities.description: Implemented validation checks to ensure data integrity and cleanliness.

activities.label: Optimization
activities.description: Simplified complex code sections, enhancing performance and readability.

activities.label: Scraping Enhancements
activities.description: Improved scripts to handle dynamic data and edge cases more effectively.

activities.label: Testing
activities.description: Conducted rigorous testing to ensure reliability of scraping processes under various conditions.

activities.label: Plotting Functions
activities.description: Added functionality to generate graphical plots from the collected data.

activities.label: Function Improvements
activities.description: Refined existing functions to better support graphical data output.

activities.label: JSON File Usage

activities.label: Testing and Debugging
activities.description: Verified the accuracy and performance of JSON-based plotting functions.

label: Day 6: JSON File Generation and Tracking

activities.label: Improved JSON Generation
